contacts_list_screen:navigation_drawer_b.name: contacts_list_screen:navigation_drawer_button
contacts_list_screen:navigation_drawer_b.description: Button to open the navigation drawer.
contacts_list_screen:navigation_drawer_b.effect: tap to navigate to the navigation_drawer_screen, which displays a navigation drawer with options including Contacts, Labels, Create label, and Settings. The toolbar at the top contains a button to close the navigation drawer, a title indicating 'Contacts', and a search button. The main content area shows a list of contacts with each contact having a button to mark as favorite, an image, and a button with the contact's name. There is also a floating action button at the bottom right corner to create a new contact.

contacts_list_screen:title.name: contacts_list_screen:title
contacts_list_screen:title.description: Title indicating the current screen is 'Contacts'.

contacts_list_screen:empty_contacts_imag.name: contacts_list_screen:empty_contacts_image
contacts_list_screen:empty_contacts_imag.description: Image indicating the contacts list is empty.

contacts_list_screen:empty_contacts_text.name: contacts_list_screen:empty_contacts_text
contacts_list_screen:empty_contacts_text.description: Text indicating the contacts list is empty.
xpath: //*[@resource_id='empty_home_view_text' and text()='Your contacts list is empty']
contacts_list_screen:empty_contacts_text.element: Your contacts list is empty

contacts_list_screen:add_contact_button.name: contacts_list_screen:add_contact_button
contacts_list_screen:add_contact_button.description: Button to add a new contact.

contacts_list_screen:create_new_contact_.name: contacts_list_screen:create_new_contact_button
contacts_list_screen:create_new_contact_.description: Floating action button to create a new contact.
contacts_list_screen:create_new_contact_.effect: tap to navigate to the edit_contact_details screen, which allows the user to create or edit a contact. The screen includes a toolbar with 'Cancel' and 'Save' buttons, and fields for entering contact details such as first name, last name, phone number, and email. Users can also add a contact photo and specify the account to which the contact will be saved. Additional fields can be accessed by tapping the 'More fields' button. The screen reflects any changes made to the contact details.

contacts_list_screen:contacts_list.name: contacts_list_screen:contacts_list
contacts_list_screen:contacts_list.description: A list of contact items presented as a ListView. Each contact item includes a button to mark as favorite, an image, and a button with the contact's name.

contacts_list_screen:contact_item.name: contacts_list_screen:contact_item
contacts_list_screen:contact_item.description: An individual contact item within the contacts_list, including a button to mark as favorite, an image, and a button with the contact's name.

contacts_list_screen:favorite_button.description: Button to mark the contact as favorite within the contact_item.

contacts_list_screen:contact_name_button.description: Button with the contact's name within the contact_item.

contact_details_screen:more_options_butt.effect: tap to navigate to the popup_options_screen, which is a popup window that includes options including sending an email, sending a message, removing contacts, renaming a label, and deleting a label.

contact_details_screen:communication_opt.effect: tap to navigate to the contacts_list_screen, which displays a list of contacts. The toolbar at the top contains a button to open the navigation drawer, a title indicating 'Contacts', and a search button. The main content area shows a list of contacts with each contact having a button to mark as favorite, an image, and a button with the contact's name. There is also a floating action button at the bottom right corner to create a new contact.

create_label_popup_screen:confirm_button.effect: tap to navigate to the label_contacts_screen, which displays the contacts associated with a specific label. The screen includes a toolbar with a navigation drawer button, a title indicating the label name, buttons for adding a contact and accessing more options, an account filter section showing the number of contacts and the associated account, and a list of contacts with quick contact buttons, images, and buttons with the contact names.

label_contacts_screen:navigation_drawer_.name: label_contacts_screen:navigation_drawer_button
label_contacts_screen:navigation_drawer_.description: Button to open the navigation drawer.
label_contacts_screen:navigation_drawer_.effect: tap to navigate to the navigation_drawer_screen, which displays a navigation drawer with options such as Contacts, Labels, Create label, and Settings. The toolbar at the top contains a button to close the navigation drawer, a title indicating 'Contacts', and a search button. The main content area shows a list of contacts with each contact having a button to mark as favorite, an image, and a button with the contact's name. There is also a floating action button at the bottom right corner to create a new contact.

label_contacts_screen:add_contact_button.name: label_contacts_screen:add_contact_button
label_contacts_screen:add_contact_button.description: Button to add a new contact.

label_contacts_screen:more_options_butto.name: label_contacts_screen:more_options_button
label_contacts_screen:more_options_butto.effect: tap to navigate to the popup_options_screen, which is a popup window that includes options including sending an email, sending a message, removing contacts, renaming the label, and deleting the label.

label_contacts_screen:add_contacts_butto.effect: tap to navigate to the select_contacts_screen, which allows the user to select contacts. The screen includes a toolbar with a navigate up button, a title indicating 'Select', and a search button. Below the toolbar, there is a section showing the account filter with an icon and a message indicating the number of contacts and the associated account. The main content area displays a list of contacts, each with a button for quick contact and a button with the contact's name.

choose_messaging_app_screen.skeleton:
<framelayout>
 <linearlayout>
  <framelayout resource_id="content">
   <scrollbar resource_id="contentPanel">
    <relativelayout resource_id="chooser_header">
    </relativelayout>
    <tabhost resource_id="profile_tabhost">
     <linearlayout>
      <framelayout resource_id="tabcontent">
       <viewpager resource_id="profile_pager">
        <relativelayout>
         <recyclerview resource_id="resolver_list">
          <linearlayout>
           <linearlayout>
            <imageview resource_id="icon">
            </imageview>
            <button resource_id="text1">
            </button>
           </linearlayout>
          </linearlayout>
         </recyclerview>
        </relativelayout>
       </viewpager>
      </framelayout>
     </linearlayout>
    </tabhost>
   </scrollbar>
  </framelayout>
 </linearlayout>
</framelayout>
